sentences.sContent: The room filled with smoke, and it was becoming difficult to breathe.
sentences.sCn: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.sContent: People are concerned about the quality of the air they breathe.
sentences.sCn: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.sContent: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .

synos.tran: 呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂
呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说

phrases.pCn: 呼吸通畅；松一口气；安心

words.tran: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
呼吸，气息；一口气，（呼吸的）一次；瞬间，瞬息；微风；迹象；气音
呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
呼吸（breath的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
